waypoints.name: Main Lobby
waypoints.instructions: Begin navigation from the main lobby. Head towards the central corridor.

waypoints.name: Central Corridor
waypoints.instructions: Continue straight down the central corridor for approximately 20 meters.

waypoints.name: Main Intersection
waypoints.instructions: At the intersection, turn right towards the cafeteria wing.

waypoints.name: Cafeteria Wing
waypoints.instructions: Continue straight down the cafeteria wing. Look for the double doors ahead.

waypoints.name: Cafeteria Entrance
waypoints.instructions: You have arrived at the cafeteria. The entrance is straight ahead.

waypoints.name: Cafeteria Entrance
waypoints.instructions: Exit the cafeteria and turn left towards the main corridor.

waypoints.name: Main Corridor
waypoints.instructions: Continue straight down the main corridor towards the building exit.

waypoints.name: Exit Doors
waypoints.instructions: The main exit doors are ahead. Proceed through the doors to exit the building.

waypoints.name: Main Lobby
waypoints.instructions: From the main lobby, head towards the east wing.

waypoints.name: East Wing
waypoints.instructions: Continue down the east wing corridor.

waypoints.name: Restroom Sign
waypoints.instructions: Look for the restroom sign on your right. The restroom is just ahead.

waypoints.name: Restroom Entrance
waypoints.instructions: You have arrived at the restroom entrance.

waypoints.name: Restroom Entrance
waypoints.instructions: Exit the restroom and turn left back towards the main corridor.

waypoints.name: Main Corridor
waypoints.instructions: Continue straight down the main corridor.

waypoints.name: Main Intersection
waypoints.instructions: At the intersection, turn left towards the cafeteria wing.

waypoints.name: Cafeteria Wing
waypoints.instructions: Continue down the cafeteria wing towards the cafeteria entrance.

waypoints.name: Cafeteria Entrance
waypoints.instructions: You have arrived at the cafeteria entrance.
